org.biohipi.image.io

Class RdaCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.biohipi.image.io.RdaCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageDecoder, ImageEncoder

    public class RdaCodec
extends java.lang.Object
implements ImageDecoder, ImageEncoder
    Class for objects that serve as both an ImageDecoder and ImageEncoder for the RDA image storage format.
    Not yet implemented.

                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: ImageDecoder
        Read and decode image from a Java InputStream.
        Specified by:
        decodeImage in interface ImageDecoder
        Parameters:
        inputStream - input stream containing serialized image data
        imageHeader - image header that was previously initialized
        Returns:
        image represented as a BioHipiImage
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if parameters are invalid or do not agree with image data

      • decodeHeaderAndImage

        public BioHipiImage decodeHeaderAndImage(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: ImageDecoder
        Read and decode both image header and image pixel data from a Java InputStream. Both of these decoded objects can be accessed through the BioHipiImage object returned by this method.
        Specified by:
        decodeHeaderAndImage in interface ImageDecoder
        Parameters:
        inputStream - input stream containing serialized image data
        Returns:
        image represented as a BioHipiImage
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error is encountered while reading from the input stream
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if parameters are invalid

                        java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: ImageEncoder
        Encode and write image to a Java OutputStream.
        Specified by:
        encodeImage in interface ImageEncoder
        Parameters:
        image - source image to be encoded
        outputStream - output stream that will receive encoded image
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if parameters are null or otherwise invalid
        java.io.IOException - if an error is encountered during stream serialization
